chunk:
Chasin Rabbits Mindful Bubble Cleanser

Brand: CHASIN' RABBITS

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, COCO-BETAINE, DISODIUM LAURETH SULFOSUCCINATE, SORBITOL, POTASSIUM COCOYL GLYCINATE, GLYCERIN, LAURYL HYDROXYSULTAINE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, DISODIUM COCOAMPHODIACETATE, PROPANEDIOL, PYRUS COMMUNIS (PEAR) FRUIT EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID, CAPRYLYL GL

IC ACID, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, BAMBUSA VULGARIS WATER, CHARCOAL POWDER, PANTHENOL, CUCUMIS MELO (MELON) FRUIT EXTRACT, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, VETIVERIA ZIZANOIDES ROOT OIL, HEDERA HELIX (IVY) LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, SODIUM CITRATE, HEXYLENE GLYCOL, LACTOBACILLUS/PUNICA GRANATUM FRUIT FERMENT EXTRACT, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, ILLICIUM VERUM (ANISE) FRUIT

VERUM (ANISE) FRUIT EXTRACT, BETA-GLUCAN, VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT EXTRACT

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
